main event: A C-50 crew sighted a circular yellow light with a reddish glow traveling at high speed over the Pacific Ocean towards Hawaii.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on October 29, 1952, and lasted for 60 seconds., The object was reported to be traveling at 300-400 knots., The crew speculated on various identification possibilities including balloon and aircraft., The object produced no sound or trail during the observation., The report indicates that two crew members observed a separate very bright white light shortly after takeoff.
sighted object: circular yellow light with reddish glow
witness description: C-50 crew members including co-pilot and engineer
